author: dgraham
msg: Added the focusIndex attribute to <html:form> which indicates the index in
the field array to receive focus.

author: dgraham
msg: Fixed bug with setting focus to a specific index of a field array (radio group).
This also fixes the issue with indexed field names.  I added the focusIndex
attribute which indicates the index in the array to receive focus.
Tested on Win2k: Netscape 4.77, Opera 6.05, IE 6.0

author: ekbush
msg: Removed unneeded path variable from execute and set the generated
ActionForward to be context-relative if generated from the ExceptionConfig
path property (since the ExceptionConfig javadoc explicitly says this

author: ekbush
msg: Updated processException to log exceptions in a more "commons-logging"-like
